name: Starrett Surface Roughness Tester, Bluetooth, Color Graph Display, Measures Ra/Rz1Max/Rsk, Diamond Stylus - SR160
short_description: Advanced Connectivity - Equipped with Bluetooth for seamless data transfer and connectivity in modern workspaces.

product_description: The Starrett SR160 Surface Roughness Tester has all the features you would expect in higher pieced units: Accuracy (in) 5% of reading + 4 micro-in., Accuracy (mm) 5% of reading + 0.1 micron, Cutoff Lengths of 0.8mm, Gaussian Filter, Measuring Range of 1600 micro-in. (40 microns), Piezoelectric Pick-up Stylus, Tests Roughness Parameters Ra,Rz,Rp,Rv,Rt,Rz1Max,Rsk,Rq,Rku,Pa,Pz,Pp,Pv,Pt, Diamond, 5 micron radius Tracer Tip, Tracing Length of 0.2 in (5mm), Tracing Speed of 0.08 in/sec (2mm/sec).

name: SUNNYSONG Professional Surface Roughness Tester with Detachable Drive Metal Surface Roughness Gauges KR310
short_description: 1. A handheld instrument suitable for production site environment and mobile measurement needs, it can measure the surface roughness of many kinds of machine tool machined parts, can calculate the corresponding parameters according to the selected measurement conditions, and display all the measurement parameters and contour graphics on the monitor.

2. Simple operation, comprehensive functions, fast measurement, stable accuracy, easy to carry, can measure the main parameters of the new international standards, the full and strict implementation of international standards.
3. Can measure the workpiece range: plane, external surface, tapered surface, bore, groove, surface, etc. (special surface needs to be measured with applicable sensors)

4. Split design: composed of host, driver and sensor, can measure the roughness of the inner wall of pipes with an inner diameter greater than 40mm, with a delay line of 1m, which can be increased to 3m.

5. The roughness measuring head employs a high-precision inductive sensor with an integrated diamond stylus, delivering stable and accurate measurements. Equipped with standard calibration blocks featuring analog waveforms, it serves as a high-precision roughness measuring instrument.

6. If the instrument is running normally, we guarantee the replacement for 3 months and the warranty for two years (except for perishable and consumable items, such as sensors, cables, etc.), and lifetime service.

name: GOYOJO GSR750 Surface Roughness Tester, High-Precision Digital Profilometer with 5 μm Diamond Stylus Inductive Sensor, Multi-Parameter Surface Finish Measurement for Engineering & Laboratory Use
short_description: Precise Multi-Parameter Profiling: GOYOJO GSR750 Surface Roughness Gauge, offers the capability to measure Multiple surface roughness parameters, including Ra, Rz, Rq, Rt, Rp, Rv, R3z, R3y, Rz(JIS), Rs, Rsk, Rku, Rsm, and Rmr. This wide range of parameters makes it suitable for various industrial applications.

Diamond Stylus Inductive Sensor: High-precision inductive sensor with a 5 μm diamond-tipped stylus. Robust design and constant 4 mN contact force ensure stable, repeatable readings on metal or coated parts, even on fine features. Advanced RC/PC-RC/Gauss/D-P filters let you adapt measurements to any surface texture.

User-Friendly Operation: Large backlit LCD shows live profile curves and all parameter values. Intuitive menu system, auto-calibration and auto-save ensure error-free results. Ideal for engineers, QC inspectors, and maintenance professionals.

Long-Life Battery & Portability: Internal Li-ion battery provides over 20 hours of continuous use, enabling full-day field or shop-floor inspection without recharging. Compact (156×55×46.5 mm) handheld design and auto-sleep power-saving extend operation time.
Solve Critical Pain Points: Prevent costly rework by detecting roughness deviations early (e.g., bearing failures, gear wear). Replace manual inspections with ASTM-certified precision.

short_description: 🔍 Versatile Parameter Measurement: The GOYOJO Surface Roughness Gauge, offers the capability to measure Multiple surface roughness parameters, including Ra, Rz, Rq, Rt, Rp, Rv, R3z, R3y, Rz(JIS), Rs, Rsk, Rku, Rsm, and Rmr. Additionally, it can be powered by a rechargeable lithium-ion battery or an external power adapter, offering flexibility in power sources.

🛠️Multiple Applications: GOYOJO Surface Roughness Tester stands out with its exceptional precision, making it an ideal choice for a diverse range of applications, including manufacturing quality control, engineering assessments, automotive industry, scientific research, and electronics manufacturing. Its digital convenience, durability, and high accuracy make it a reliable tool for users seeking precise and efficient surface quality assessments across various industries.

product_description: AMTAST Professional Surface Roughness Meter Product Information: 1. Measurement Range: 1) The Z axis (vertical): ±80μm/±160µm (enhanced model) 2) The X axis (Transverse): 20mm 3) Parameter Range: a) Ra,Rq: 0.005μm ~ 30μm b) Rz,R3z,Ry,Rt,Rp,Rm: 0.02μm ~ 320μm c) Sk: 0~100% d) S,Sm: 1mm e) tp: 0~100% 2. Resolution: The Z axis (vertical): 1) 0.01μm/±20μm 2) 0.02μm/±40μm 3) 0.04μm/±80μm 4) 0.08μm/±160μm 3. Measurement item: 1) Parameter: Ra, Rz, Rq, Rt, Rp, Rv, R3z, R3y, Rz(JIS), Rs, Rsk, Rsm, Rku, Rmr, Ry(JIS), Rmax, RPc, Rk, Rpk, Rvk, Mr1, Mr2 2) Standard: ISO, ANSI, DIN, JIS 3) Graphic: Bearing area curve, Roughness profile, Primary profile 4. Filter: RC,PC-RC,Gauss,D-P 5. The sampling length (lr): 0.25, 0.8, 2.5mm 6. Assessment length (ln): Ln= lr×n n=1~5 7. Sensor: 1) Measuring method: skidded 2) Stylus tip: Diamond, 90 cone angle, force 4mN, 5μm Radius (standard), Optional 60 cone angle, force 0.75mN, 5μm Radius for smooth surface. 3) Force: <4mN (90°); <0.75mN (60°, optional) 4) Skid part: hard alloy, skid radius of curvature: 40mm 5) Traversing speed: lr=0.25: Vt=0.135mm/s lr=0.8: Vt=0.5mm/s lr=2.5: Vt=1mm/s Return: Vt=1mm/s 8. Accuracy: Less than ±10% 9. Repeatability: Less than 6% 10. Power supply: Built-in Lithium ion battery, Charger: DC5V, 800mA 11. Outline dimension: Main unit: 64*53*160mm; drive: 23*27*115mm 12. Weight (main unit): Around 380g 13. Working Environment: Temperature: - 20℃ ~ 40℃; Humidity: <90% RH 14. Store and Transportation: Temperature: - 40℃ ~ 60℃; Humidity: <90% RH
